verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
[Verse]
By His stripes we are healed
By His nail-pierced hands we're free
By His blood we're washed clean
Now we have the victory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[Pre-Chorus]
The power of sin is broken, Jesus overcame it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He has won our freedom, Jesus has won it all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Hallelu-jah, You have won the victory
Hallelu-jah, You have won it all for me
Death could not hold You down
You are the risen King
Seated in majesty
You are the risen King

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
[Verse]
By His stripes we are healed
By His nail-pierced hands we're free
By His blood we're washed clean
Now we have the victory

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
[Pre-Chorus]
The power of sin is broken, Jesus overcame it all
He has won our freedom, Jesus has won it all

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Hallelu-jah, You have won the victory
Hallelu-jah, You have won it all for me
Death could not hold You down
You are the risen King
Seated in majesty
You are the risen King

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
[Bridge]
Our God has risen, He is alive
He won the victory, He reigns on high

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Hallelu-jah, You have won the victory
Hallelu-jah, You have won it all for me
Death could not hold You down
You are the risen King
Seated in majesty
You are the risen King

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Hallelu-jah, You have won the victory
Hallelu-jah, You have won it all for me
Death could not hold You down
